text: “Jerusalemɨn gumazamiziba kamaghɨn nɨghnɨgh suam, bizir kam a guizbangɨra puvatɨ. Me fo, me fomɨra Babilonian atrivim ko akar dɨkɨrɨzibagh amua ghaze, me an apengan ikiam. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, me ghaze, mɨdorozitam me bativan kogham. Ezɨ puvatɨ. Babilonɨn atrivim, men arazir kuraba bangɨn akam me gasɨ, men suigh me isɨ kalabus darɨgham.
